services.title: Meta Ads Management
services.description: Complete Meta advertising solutions including campaign setup, creative strategy, A/B testing, retargeting and performance optimization.
services.heroSubtitle: Turn your Meta ad spend into predictable, profitable revenue across Facebook and Instagram.
painPoints: Ad accounts spending without clear return or tracking.
Campaigns that rely on broad targeting with no proper testing structure.
Creative fatigue causing results to drop after a few weeks.
solutions: Build a clear campaign structure with naming conventions and testing frameworks.
Install and configure proper tracking, events and aggregated events measurement.
Continuous creative testing with hooks, angles and formats that match your brand.

deliverables.title: Strategy & Planning
deliverables.description: Deep-dive audit, market research and media plan tailored to your goals.

deliverables.title: Campaign Setup
deliverables.description: Full-funnel campaigns with testing, scaling and retargeting structures.

deliverables.title: Ongoing Optimization
deliverables.description: Weekly optimization of bids, budgets, creatives and audiences.

deliverables.title: Reporting & Insights
deliverables.description: Transparent reporting with clear actions and next steps.

processSteps.title: Audit & Strategy
processSteps.description: We review your ad account, tracking and offers, then build a clear growth plan.

processSteps.title: Setup & Launch
processSteps.description: We implement campaign structure, tracking and creatives, then launch in phases.

processSteps.title: Optimize & Scale
processSteps.description: We optimize daily, test aggressively and scale what works while cutting waste.

processSteps.title: Report & Iterate
processSteps.description: You get simple reports and action items so you always know what is happening.

caseStudies.title: Fashion Brand Scale-Up
caseStudies.description: We rebuilt the account structure and testing process, unlocking profitable scaling.

faqs.question: What ad budget do I need to start?
faqs.answer: Most brands see best results starting from $2,000â€“$3,000 per month in ad spend, but we can review your situation on a call.

faqs.question: Do you also create ad creatives?
faqs.answer: Yes. We can either work with your existing assets or create new concepts based on your brand guidelines.

services.title: Shopify Development
services.description: Complete Shopify solutions including custom theme development, app integration, payment setup, product listing and store management.
services.heroSubtitle: Launch or upgrade a high-converting Shopify store that feels premium and is easy to manage.
painPoints: Themes that look generic and do not reflect your brand.
Slow stores with confusing navigation and low conversion rates.
Technical setup issues with payments, shipping, apps or tracking.
solutions: Custom theme work and UX updates focused on conversion and AOV.
Performance-first build with clean structure and optimized assets.
Complete setup of payments, shipping, apps and analytics.

deliverables.title: Store Architecture
deliverables.description: Navigation, collections and product structure that make sense to customers.

deliverables.title: Theme Design & Build
deliverables.description: Custom or heavily optimized theme tailored to your brand.

deliverables.title: Apps & Integrations
deliverables.description: Installation and configuration of the key apps you actually need.

deliverables.title: Launch & Handover
deliverables.description: Launch support plus training so your team can manage the store with confidence.

processSteps.title: Discovery & Planning
processSteps.description: We understand your brand, products and goals, then define the right store structure.

processSteps.title: Design & Build
processSteps.description: We design and build the theme, set up products and configure key apps.

processSteps.title: Testing & Launch
processSteps.description: We test checkout, flows and tracking before going live.

processSteps.title: Optimization & Support
processSteps.description: After launch we monitor performance and implement quick wins.

caseStudies.title: DTC Home Brand Redesign
caseStudies.description: A new Shopify experience with optimized PDPs and faster load times.

faqs.question: Can you work with my existing theme?
faqs.answer: Yes. We can either improve your current theme or recommend a better starting point.

faqs.question: Do you also handle ongoing maintenance?
faqs.answer: We offer retainers for ongoing changes, optimization and support after launch.

services.title: TikTok Ads Management
services.description: Data-driven TikTok Ads management including campaign strategy, audience targeting, creative testing and performance optimization for maximum ROI.
services.heroSubtitle: Reach your ideal customers on TikTok with performance-driven campaigns that convert and scale.
painPoints: Ad campaigns not targeted correctly, wasting budget on wrong audiences.
Low engagement and conversion rates from TikTok Ads.
Lack of expertise in TikTok's unique algorithm and ad formats.
solutions: Data-driven campaign strategy with proper audience segmentation and targeting.
Continuous creative testing and optimization based on real performance data.
Expert knowledge of TikTok Ads formats, placements and algorithm best practices.

deliverables.title: Campaign Strategy
deliverables.description: Comprehensive strategy audit and tailored TikTok Ads campaign plan for your goals.

deliverables.title: Ad Setup & Launch
deliverables.description: Campaign setup with proper targeting, creative variations and conversion tracking.

deliverables.title: Ongoing Optimization
deliverables.description: Daily campaign monitoring with bid adjustments, budget allocation and creative testing.

deliverables.title: Performance Reporting
deliverables.description: Weekly reports with clear metrics, insights and actionable recommendations.

processSteps.title: Strategy & Audit
processSteps.description: We analyze your business goals and develop a TikTok Ads strategy tailored to your audience.

processSteps.title: Campaign Setup
processSteps.description: We create and launch campaigns with targeted audiences, compelling creatives and proper tracking.

processSteps.title: Test & Optimize
processSteps.description: We run A/B tests, analyze results and continuously optimize for better performance.

processSteps.title: Scale & Report
processSteps.description: We scale winning campaigns and provide transparent reporting on results and ROI.

caseStudies.title: E-Commerce Brand Growth
caseStudies.description: We built a profitable TikTok Ads strategy that scaled from test budget to 5-figure monthly spend.

faqs.question: What's the minimum ad budget to start?
faqs.answer: We recommend starting with $1,500â€“$2,500 per month for meaningful results and proper testing.

faqs.question: How is TikTok Ads different from Meta Ads?
faqs.answer: TikTok has a unique algorithm, different audience demographics, and native ad formats that require a different strategy.

services.title: Social Media Management
services.description: Full-service social media management including content strategy, posting, community engagement, analytics and brand growth across all platforms.
services.heroSubtitle: Build an engaged community and consistent brand presence across all your social platforms.
painPoints: Inconsistent posting and content that doesn't align with your brand voice.
Low engagement rates and minimal community interaction.
Managing multiple platforms without a clear strategy or measurable results.
solutions: Comprehensive content calendar with consistent, on-brand posting across all platforms.
Strategic engagement tactics that build real community and loyal followers.
Data-driven approach with monthly analytics and growth optimization.

deliverables.title: Content Strategy & Calendar
deliverables.description: Custom content strategy and 30-60 day content calendar tailored to your brand.

deliverables.title: Content Creation
deliverables.description: Professional copywriting, graphics and media management for all platforms.

deliverables.title: Community Management
deliverables.description: Daily engagement, responding to comments and building authentic community relationships.

deliverables.title: Analytics & Reporting
deliverables.description: Monthly performance reports with growth metrics and strategic recommendations.

processSteps.title: Brand Audit
processSteps.description: We review your brand voice, audience and existing social presence.

processSteps.title: Strategy Development
processSteps.description: We create a content strategy, platform roadmap and posting calendar.

processSteps.title: Content Execution
processSteps.description: We create and post content, manage community and engage with your audience daily.

processSteps.title: Measure & Iterate
processSteps.description: We track performance, report monthly results and optimize strategy based on data.

caseStudies.title: Beauty Brand Social Growth
caseStudies.description: We built a cohesive social strategy across Instagram, TikTok and YouTube with consistent growth.

faqs.question: Which platforms do you manage?
faqs.answer: We manage Instagram, TikTok, Facebook, YouTube, LinkedIn and Twitter. We customize based on where your audience is.

faqs.question: How much content do you create?
faqs.answer: Depends on your plan, but typically 5-10 posts per week across all platforms with daily community engagement.

services.title: Etsy Store Setup
services.description: Complete Etsy shop setup and optimization including store design, product listings, SEO, shop policies and launch strategy for maximum visibility.
services.heroSubtitle: Launch a professional Etsy shop that ranks high in search and converts browsers into customers.
painPoints: Generic Etsy shop design that doesn't stand out from competitors.
Poor product listing optimization leading to low search visibility.
Unclear shop policies and unclear brand story confusing potential buyers.
solutions: Professional shop branding and customization that reflects your unique product line.
SEO-optimized product listings with keyword research and high-quality photos.
Clear shop story, policies and messaging that build trust with buyers.

deliverables.title: Shop Setup & Customization
deliverables.description: Complete shop setup with branding, banner, policies and shop sections.

deliverables.title: Product Listings
deliverables.description: SEO-optimized product listings with descriptions, tags and high-quality photos.

deliverables.title: Shop Branding
deliverables.description: Cohesive brand story, shop announcement and clear messaging for buyer confidence.

deliverables.title: Launch Support
deliverables.description: Launch checklist, initial promotion strategy and post-launch optimization tips.

processSteps.title: Shop Planning
processSteps.description: We understand your products, target market and set up shop structure.

processSteps.title: Shop Setup
processSteps.description: We create shop branding, customize the storefront and implement all essential settings.

processSteps.title: Product Listing
processSteps.description: We create and optimize all product listings with SEO and high-quality photography.

processSteps.title: Launch & Optimize
processSteps.description: We launch your shop and implement initial promotion tactics and optimization strategies.

caseStudies.title: Handmade Jewelry Shop Launch
caseStudies.description: We set up an optimized Etsy shop with SEO-friendly listings and professional branding.

faqs.question: Do you handle product photography?
faqs.answer: We optimize listings with best practices, but recommend professional photography for best results. We can guide you or recommend photographers.

faqs.question: How long does it take to see sales?
faqs.answer: With proper optimization, most shops see their first sales within 2-4 weeks, with growth accelerating after that.
